title: Caleb Receives Hebron
summary: Joshua 14 recounts how Caleb, one of the faithful spies, receives Hebron as his inheritance. Though 85 years old, he remains strong and eager to take the hill country promised to him by Moses.

faq.question: What land did Caleb receive?
faq.answer: Hebron, in the hill country of Judah.

faq.question: Why was Caleb rewarded?
faq.answer: Because he followed the Lord wholeheartedly and remained faithful when others did not.
